text: August Erne (15 February 1905 - 15 October 1987) was a Swiss racing cyclist. He was the Swiss National Road Race champion in 1932. He also rode in the 1932 and 1934 Tour de France. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1905 births Category:1987 deaths Category:People from Zurzach District Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: August Erne
